properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters from Schoodic Point, ME to Stonington, ME out 25 NM; Coastal Waters from Eastport, ME to Schoodic Point, ME out 25 NM
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued February 19 at 3:17AM EST until February 19 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Caribou ME
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, west winds 20 to 25 kt with gusts
up to 35 kt and seas 6 to 8 feet expected. For the Freezing
Spray Advisory, light accumulation of freezing spray expected.

* WHERE...Coastal Waters from Eastport, ME to Schoodic Point, ME
out 25 NM and Coastal Waters from Schoodic Point, ME to
Stonington, ME out 25 NM.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 9 AM this morning to 7 PM
EST this evening. For the Freezing Spray Advisory, from 1 AM
to 1 PM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Operating a vessel in freezing spray is hazardous.
Freezing spray may render mechanical and electronic components
inoperative. Ice accretion on decks and superstructures may
result in some loss of stability. Strong winds will cause
hazardous seas which could capsize or damage vessels and reduce
visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should prepare for accumulation of ice on their vessel
and consider altering plans to avoid or mitigate these hazardous
navigating conditions.

Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...FREEZING SPRAY ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 1 PM EST THURSDAY
